Judul: DESIGN AND APPLICATI ON OF VIRTUAL REALIT Y  TECHNOLOGY IN 3D INT ERIOR DESIGN AND SIM ULATION  SYSTEM
Abstrak:
With  the  development  of  economy  and  society,  virtual  reality  technology  has 
been paid more and more attention and has been gradually applied to all walks of life. Due to 
the  interactivity,  immersion  and  real  time  of  virtual  reality  technology,  the  application  of  VR 
has a wide prospect in the field of architecture, especially in the interior decoration and design, 
the  advantage  of  this  technology  is  incomparable  with  other  technologies.  The  interior 
design using virtual reality can let the designer and the user experience the effect of what you see. In 
addition,  it  also  allows  users  to  feel  like  being  inside  the  designed  virtual  scene of this  design and  feeling  immersive.  In  this  paper,  the  3D interior  design  and  simulation system  is  taken  as 
the research object, and the  virtual reality technology is applied to the design and application 
of the simulation system.
Kata Kunci: Virtual reality; Interior design; 3D modeling; Simulation system
Sumber: ACADEMIC JOURNAL OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERING, VOL.  16 , ISSUE  3 /2018
